whatstk

  • Contribute

Contribute¶

We are really open to your thoughts and feedback!

Bug reporting¶

Please report any bug that you may found to the issues section.

Requesting a Feature¶

If you find a new feature could be useful for the community, please try to add it in the issues section with a clear description.

Submitting a Pull Request¶

After forking and editing the code, make sure that your code passes all the tests:

sh ./run-tests.sh

Adding new examples¶

To add new examples, consider editing yourself a rst file in docs/source/ directory in the repository.
